0000010001010101 1100000100001110 0 -> sum: 1100010101100011, cout: 0

0101011000100001 0011010100001001 0 -> sum: 1000101100101010, cout: 0
0100111000010110 0000001110101000 0 -> sum: 0101000110111110, cout: 0
0110101111001001 1011111111011100 1 -> sum: 0010101110100110, cout: 1
0111010000110001 0011000111010000 0 -> sum: 1010011000000001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
